data.title: Umicore Precious Metals Chemistry USA, LLC et al v. Trustees of Boston College
authors: US District Court for the District of Massachusetts
data.meta_description: Patent case filed on December 30, 2022  in the Massachusetts District Court
data.text: January 19, 2023 Filing 9 Judge George A. OToole, Jr: ELECTRONIC ORDER entered GRANTING #4 MOTION to Seal Document #1 Complaint, and Exhibits A, H, J-L. (de Oliveira, Flaviana) January 3, 2023 Filing 8 NOTICE of Appearance by John Custer on behalf of Umicore AG & Co. KG, Umicore Precious Metals Chemistry USA, LLC (Custer, John) December 30, 2022 Filing 7 CORPORATE DISCLOSURE STATEMENT by Umicore AG & Co. KG, Umicore Precious Metals Chemistry USA, LLC identifying Corporate Parent Umicore USA Inc., Corporate Parent Umicore NV/SA for Umicore Precious Metals Chemistry USA, LLC; Corporate Parent Umicore NV/SA for Umicore AG & Co. KG.. (Rodrigues, Ruben) December 30, 2022 Filing 6 Summons Issued as to Trustees of Boston College. Counsel receiving this notice electronically should download this summons, complete one for each defendant and serve it in accordance with Fed.R.Civ.P. 4 and LR 4.1. Summons will be mailed to plaintiff(s) not receiving notice electronically for completion of service. (Dore, Samantha) December 30, 2022 Filing 5 ELECTRONIC NOTICE of Case Assignment. Judge George A. OToole, Jr assigned to case. If the trial Judge issues an Order of Reference of any matter in this case to a Magistrate Judge, the matter will be transmitted to Magistrate Judge M. Page Kelley. (Finn, Mary) December 30, 2022 Filing 4 MOTION to Seal Document #1 Complaint,, and Exhibits A, H, J-L by Umicore AG & Co. KG, Umicore Precious Metals Chemistry USA, LLC.(Rodrigues, Ruben) December 30, 2022 Filing 3 Entry Made In Error (Dore, Samantha) December 30, 2022 Filing 2 REPORT ON THE FILING OF AN ACTION REGARDING PATENT OR TRADEMARK. (Rodrigues, Ruben)
